properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND HASHTAG LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , PROFILE_IMG , COUNT , USER_NO , USER_NICKNAME , USER_ID , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , STYLE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT STYLE_NO , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE GROUP BY STYLE_NO ORDER BY COUNT DESC) RIGHT JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) JOIN TB_USER U USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND U.STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , COUNT , PROFILE_IMG , USER_NO , USER_NICKNAME , USER_ID , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , STYLE_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE GROUP BY STYLE_NO ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) RIGHT JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) JOIN TB_USER U USING (USER_NO) WHERE HASHTAG LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND S.STATUS = 'Y' AND U.STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , PROFILE_IMG , COUNT , USER_NICKNAME , USER_ID , USER_NO , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , STYLE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT STYLE_NO , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE GROUP BY STYLE_NO ) RIGHT JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) JOIN TB_USER U USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY STYLE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT IMG_NO , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , STYLE_NO , FILE_LEVEL FROM TB_STYLE_IMG I JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.STATUS = 'Y' AND STYLE_NO = ? ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL ASC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT HASHTAG_NO , KEYWORD FROM TB_HASHTAG ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE ( STYLE_NO , STYLE_CONTENT , HASHTAG , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.nextval , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE_IMG ( IMG_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL , STYLE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_SINO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE_PD ( STYLE_NO , PRODUCT_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL , ? )
SELECT HASHTAG_NO FROM TB_HASHTAG WHERE KEYWORD = ?
INSERT INTO TB_HASHTAG ( HASHTAG_NO , KEYWORD ) VALUES ( SEQ_HNO.NEXTVAL , ? )
UPDATE TB_HASHTAG SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE KEYWORD = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , PROFILE_IMG , COUNT , USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NICKNAME , INTRODUCE , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , STYLE_CONTENT FROM (SELECT STYLE_NO , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE GROUP BY STYLE_NO ) RIGHT JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) JOIN TB_USER U USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND U.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ? ORDER BY STYLE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE L JOIN TB_STYLE USING (STYLE_NO) WHERE L.USER_NO = ? AND STYLE_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STYLE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE_LIKE ( USER_NO , STYLE_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )

SELECT STYLE_NO , PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME_KO , PRODUCT_NAME_ENG , PRODUCT_IMG_M , BRAND_NAME FROM TB_STYLE_PD JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) JOIN TB_BRAND USING (BRAND_CODE) WHERE STYLE_NO = ? AND S.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE_REP ( REPORT_NO , REPORTED_USER_NO , REPORTING_USER_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , STYLE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT STYLE_NO , STYLE_CONTENT , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , USER_NICKNAME , USER_NO FROM TB_STYLE S JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE STYLE_NO = ? AND S.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_STYLE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STYLE_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_STYLE_IMG SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STYLE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE S JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NICKNAME = ? AND S.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STYLE S JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND HASHTAG LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND S.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , PROFILE_IMG , STYLE_CONTENT , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , USER_NO , USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_STYLE S JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NICKNAME = ? AND S.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY S.ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT STYLE_NO , PROFILE_IMG , STYLE_CONTENT , S.ENROLL_DATE , HASHTAG , USER_NO , USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_STYLE S JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND HASHTAG LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND S.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY S.ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
DELETE FROM TB_STYLE_IMG WHERE STYLE_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TB_STYLE_PD WHERE STYLE_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_STYLE SET STYLE_CONTENT = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , HASHTAG = ? WHERE STYLE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE_IMG ( IMG_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL , STYLE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_SINO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_STYLE_PD ( STYLE_NO , PRODUCT_CODE ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO FROM TB_STYLE_REP )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , U.USER_ID "REPORTED_USER_ID" , I.USER_ID "REPORTING_USER_ID" , REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , STYLE_NO , REPORT_CHECK FROM TB_STYLE_REP JOIN TB_USER U ON (REPORTED_USER_ID = U.USER_NO) JOIN TB_USER I ON (REPORTING_USER_ID = I.USER_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , U.USER_ID "REPORTED_USER_ID" , I.USER_ID "REPORTING_USER_ID" , REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , STYLE_NO , REPORT_CHECK FROM TB_STYLE_REP JOIN TB_USER U ON (REPORTED_USER_ID = U.USER_NO) JOIN TB_USER I ON (REPORTING_USER_ID = I.USER_NO) WHERE REPORT_CHECK = ? ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , U.USER_ID "REPORTED_USER_ID" , I.USER_ID "REPORTING_USER_ID" , REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , STYLE_NO , REPORT_CHECK FROM TB_STYLE_REP JOIN TB_USER U ON (REPORTED_USER_ID = U.USER_NO) JOIN TB_USER I ON (REPORTING_USER_ID = I.USER_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
